mapper.select: SELECT m.MOVIE_NAME, c.CINEMA_NAME, s.SCREEN_NAME, t.TIME_DATE, t.START_TIME, t.END_TIME, t.TIME_NO FROM TIME t, CINEMA c, SCREEN s, MC_MOVIE m WHERE t.CINEMA_NO = c.CINEMA_NO AND t.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO AND t.MOVIE_NO= m.MOVIE_NO ORDER BY t.TIME_NO DESC

select t.time_no, m.movie_no, m.movie_name, m.movie_type, m.movie_age, t.start_time, t.end_time, c.cinema_name, sc.screen_name, t.time_date, t.screen_no, mf.poster_savname, (select count(*) from seat where screen_no = sc.screen_no) as total_seat, (select count(*) from time_seat where time_no = t.time_no and status = 0) as possible_seat from time t inner join mc_movie m on m.movie_no = t.movie_no inner join mc_movie_file mf on m.movie_no = mf.movie_no inner join cinema c on c.cinema_no = t.cinema_no inner join screen sc on sc.screen_no = t.screen_no order by t.start_time asc

SELECT m.MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_NAME, c.CINEMA_NO, c.CINEMA_NAME, s.SCREEN_NO, s.SCREEN_NAME, t.TIME_DATE, t.START_TIME, t.END_TIME, t.TIME_NO FROM TIME t, CINEMA c, SCREEN s, MC_MOVIE m WHERE t.CINEMA_NO = c.CINEMA_NO AND t.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO AND t.MOVIE_NO= m.MOVIE_NO AND t.TIME_NO = #{TIME_NO}
mapper.insert:
SELECT MC_TIME_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TIME ( TIME_NO, MOVIE_NO, CINEMA_NO, SCREEN_NO, TIME_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME ) VALUES ( #{TIME_NO}, #{MOVIE_NO}, #{CINEMA_NO}, #{SCREEN_NO}, SYSDATE, #{START_TIME}, #{END_TIME} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TIME SET MOVIE_NO = #{MOVIE_NO}, CINEMA_NO = #{CINEMA_NO}, SCREEN_NO = #{SCREEN_NO}, TIME_DATE = #{TIME_DATE}, START_TIME = #{START_TIME}, END_TIME = #{END_TIME}, MOVIE_CNT = #{MOVIE_CNT} WHERE TIME_NO = #{TIME_NO}
